alert.note: Alert for Dade (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 06 at 3:31PM EST until December 07 at 2:42AM EST by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Tennessee...Georgia... Lookout Creek near New England affecting Hamilton and Dade Counties. For the Lookout Creek...including New England, Flintstone...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL JUST AFTER MIDNIGHT TONIGHT... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Lookout Creek near New England. * WHEN...Until just after midnight tonight. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 3:00 PM EST Tuesday the stage was 12.9 feet. - Forecast...The river has crested and is expected to fall below flood stage this evening. - Flood stage is 12.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at weather.gov/atlanta.
